snippet: An intelligence-sharing center will allow retailers to share information about data breaches and potential threats as well as to inform industry analysts and members of law enforcement.
abstract: Retailers Industry Leaders Assn, along with several top retailers, opens intelligence-sharing center focused on prevention of cybercrimes against retailers.
lead_paragraph: An intelligence-sharing center will allow retailers to share information about data breaches and potential threats as well as to inform industry analysts and members of law enforcement.

headline.main: Top U.S. Retailers to Share Data in Fight on Cybercrime
headline.print_headline: Top U.S. Retailers to Share Data in Fight on Cybercrime
